snippet: The conductor Roger Nierenberg uses his Music Paradigm program to teach corporate employees and managers leadership skills through music.
abstract: James R Oestreich Critic's Notebook praises Roger Nierenberg for latest iteration of his Music Paradigm series, featuring unusual performance by members of the Metropolitan Opera Orchestra at Lincoln Center; audience, consisting entirely of nursing directors from New York-Presbyterian Hospital, witnessed Nerenberg conducting a live rehearsal with orchestra, part of effort to use music to teach corporate employees leadership skills through music.
lead_paragraph: The conductor Roger Nierenberg uses his Music Paradigm program to teach corporate employees and managers leadership skills through music.

headline.seo: Roger Nierenberg and the Music Paradigm Program
headline.main: There’s a Lesson Here; All You Have to Do Is Listen
headline.print_headline: There’s a Lesson Here; All You Have to Do Is Listen
